title: Russia Calls for U.N. Investigation of Nord Stream Attack, as Hersh Accuses White House of False Flag
description:
Moscow claims Germany, Denmark, and Sweden are engaged in a U.S.-backed cover-up, as the war to control the narrative — and the evidence — intensifies.

The post Russia Calls for U.N. Investigation of Nord Stream Attack, as Hersh Accuses White House of False Flag appeared first on The Intercept.

title: What It Means for Trump's Campaign to Start In Waco
description:
Holding his first rally near the site of an infamous federal raid could be seen as “a coded message to those on the extreme.”

The post What It Means for Trump’s Campaign to Start In Waco appeared first on The Intercept.
